channel.title: Member equip
channel.description: okay so i tried changing the 1 to 0 etc etc, but it seems everyone including me cannot equip certain items, if someone can help me i need a way to make all people playing the server and people who just logged in auto member, so basically there is no members. please dont lock this ihave tried everything and need help, not eating from spoons :(

item.title: Member equip
item.dc:creator: @galderguy galderguy
item.description:
@galderguy wrote:

thanks all for your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Member equip
item.dc:creator: @daniel89 daniel89
item.description:
@daniel89 wrote:

Open your player.java and search for this

playerIsMember = 0;

change the 0 to 1. You just made it so every new account that logs in is now a member.

For your current members i would make a portal temporary when used it gives the person member.

Read full topic

item.title: Member equip
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Try searching “MemberCL” or “MembersCL” and remove it, along with the item IDs inside. Compile, if you get errors, go to the where the errors are, and remove those too (If they involve the items that require membership).

Read full topic

item.title: Member equip
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

make sure on your code you have

&& playerRights >= 1

the symbol means greater than or equal to
<= is less than or equal to
and == means equal to, which is like only for a certain number of rights

Read full topic
